>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: INVALID SOURCE CITATION, NOT A SOURCE DIVISION

id:: td-000029

######################################################################

This paragraph is followed by an INVALID source citation to a source
with ID `bogus'.  The ID 'bogus' refers to a listing and not to a
source. [cite:bogus].

---LISTING

title:: Bogus Listing

label:: bogus

This is a bogus listing.

---LISTING

<<<DOCUMENT
